text: The Minardi M192 was a Formula One car designed by Aldo Costa and Rene Hilhorst and built by Minardi for the 1992 Formula One season. The car was powered by the Lamborghini V12 engine and ran on Goodyear tyres. Its best finish in a race was 6th. ==Complete Formula One results== (key) (results in bold indicate pole position; results in italics indicate fastest lap) {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:95%" |- !
